docs.snippet: LONDON, May 9 A list of 67 journalists who have been detained for political reasons or have "disappeared" in 17 countries was issued today by Amnesty International, a Britishbased human rights organization.

headline.main: JOURNALISTS HELD BY 17 COUNTRIES; Amnesty Unit Lists 67 Who 'Disappeared' or Are Jailed for Political Reasons

docs.snippet: BOGOTA, Colombia, May 12 The presidents of Colombia and Venezuela feel that Cuba's military intervention in Angola was deplorable, but this has not altered their policy of seeking a normalization of Latin American relations with Havana.

docs.snippet: PARIS, May 16--The clubhouse is the French Finance Ministry. The members are  middle-bracket civil servants from some countries that cannot pay their bills and other countries to whom the bills are owed. The club's purpose is to stretch out debt for...
docs.lead_paragraph: PARIS, May 16--The clubhouse is the French Finance Ministry. The members are middle-bracket civil servants from some countries that cannot pay their bills and other countries to whom the bills are owed. The club's purpose is to stretch out debt for countries on the verge of bankruptcy.
docs.abstract: Article on Club of Paris, which has become prominent as 1 of lesser known insts of internatl community following demands of developing nations for generalized debt moratorium; rescheduling of debts of some nations noted; arguments against debt rescheduling discussed (L)

headline.main: Club of Paris Expands Role in Helping Debtor Nations; ROLE IS EXPANDED BY CLUB OF PARIS

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, May 22 (AP)--Two former Uruguayan Legislators living in exile were found dead of multiple gunshot wounds with their hands tied behind them, the Argentine police reported tonight.
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, May 22 (AP)--Two former Uruguayan Legislators living in exile were found dead of multiple gunshot wounds with their hands tied behind them, the Argentine police reported tonight.
docs.abstract: ex-Sen Zelmar Michehni and ex-Chamber of Deputies head Hector Gutierrez Ruiz, Uruguayan exiles who were reptdly kidnapped from their homes May 18, are found dead with multiple gunshot wounds; police say body of woman Carmen Barredo de Schroeder and unidentified man were also found in car with exiles; Michelini and Gutierrez Ruiz exiled to Argentina in '73 when Pres Juan Maria Bordaberry closed cong and suspended pol activity (M)

headline.main: Two Ex-Legislators Who Fled Uruguay Slain in Argentina

docs.lead_paragraph: MONTREAL, May 24 (UPI) Poland will open defense of its Olympic soccer championship July 18 against Uruguay, the International Federation of Football Associations announced today. In other opening day competition, East Germany will meet Brazil, Spain will play Zambia and Iran will face Nigeria.
